pages.text: $(li)Glowsquitos are an horrible pest that can be found in the Glowstone Canyons of the Nether.$(br)$(li)These neutral creatures loves sucking the dust out of Glowstone, turning it to Dimstone and finally to Dullstone.$(br)$(li)You can breed Glowsquitos giving them Shroomlight Juice.
$(li)Be careful if you attack one of these creatures, because after that, all of them will attack you.
